price: Do not be like those who forgot Allah, so He made them forget themselves. It is they who are the evildoers.
arabic: وَلَا تَكُونُواْ كَٱلَّذِينَ نَسُواْ ٱللَّهَ فَأَنسَىٰهُمۡ أَنفُسَهُمۡۚ أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلۡفَٰسِقُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
